description: APIResource specifies the name of a resource and whether it is namespaced.

categories.description: categories is a list of the grouped resources this resource belongs to (e.g. 'all')

kind.description: kind is the kind for the resource (e.g. 'Foo' is the kind for a resource 'foo')

name.description: name is the plural name of the resource.

namespaced.description: namespaced indicates if a resource is namespaced or not.

shortNames.description: shortNames is a list of suggested short names of the resource.

singularName.description: singularName is the singular name of the resource.  This allows clients to handle plural and singular opaquely. The singularName is more correct for reporting status on a single item and both singular and plural are allowed from the kubectl CLI interface.

verbs.description: verbs is a list of supported kube verbs (this includes get, list, watch, create, update, patch, delete, deletecollection, and proxy)
